messages.title: A future fair for families
messages.content: Our tax credits provide that little bit of extra help in our pockets every month which makes a real difference to our family. If the Tories get elected, they’ve said that ordinary working families like ours will no longer receive any tax credits. I don’t know how we’d do without them. That's why we're backing Maryam Khan for Bury North.

mentions.candidate: That's why we're backing Maryam Khan for Bury North.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: If the Tories get elected, they’ve said that ordinary working families like ours will no longer receive any tax credits.
